# pacta.data.scraping

The goal of `pacta.data.scraping` is to provide tools to scrape critical
data sets from web sources and prepare them for input to the PACTA data
preparation process.

## Installation

You can install the development version of pacta.data.scraping from
[R-universe](https://r-universe.dev) with:

``` r
install.packages("pacta.data.scraping", repos = "https://rmi-pacta.r-universe.dev")
```

or from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("RMI-PACTA/pacta.data.scraping")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`get_currency_exchange_rates()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.data.scraping/reference/get_currency_exchange_rates.md)
  : Get currency exchange rates for a given quarter from the IMF API
- [`get_index_regions()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.data.scraping/reference/get_index_regions.md)
  : Get the definition of MSCI regions (in terms of member countries)
- [`get_ishares_index_data()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.data.scraping/reference/get_ishares_index_data.md)
  : Scrape index data from the iShares website
- [`process_ishares_index_data()`](https://rmi-pacta.github.io/pacta.data.scraping/reference/process_ishares_index_data.md)
  : Process raw iShares data into PACTA readable format
